publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-898# Christine Grahame: Scottish Tomato Industry—That the Parliament notes the crisis in the Scottish tomato industry due to the failure of leading Scottish supermarkets to stock its produce; recognises that Scottish produce is renowned for its high quality; further recognises that the fresh produce industry supports thousands of Scottish jobs, and recommends to Scotland’s major food retailers that Scottish produce be promoted in their stores.
S1M-898# Scottish Tomato Industry (lodged on 23 May 2000) Michael Russell*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-898# Christine Grahame: Scottish Tomato Industry—That the Parliament notes the crisis in the Scottish tomato industry due to the failure of leading Scottish supermarkets to stock its produce; recognises that Scottish produce is renowned for its high quality; further recognises that the fresh produce industry supports thousands of Scottish jobs, and recommends to Scotland’s major food retailers that Scottish produce be promoted in their stores. Supported by: Michael Russell, Mr Brian Monteith, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison*
S1M-898# Scottish Tomato Industry (lodged on 23 May 2000) David Mundell*, Donald Gorrie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Andrew Wilson*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-898# Scottish Tomato Industry (lodged on 23 May 2000) Mr John Swinney*, Alex Neil*, Irene McGugan*

S1M-898# Christine Grahame: Scottish Tomato Industry-That the Parliament notes the crisis in the Scottish tomato industry due to the failure of leading Scottish supermarkets to stock its produce; recognises that Scottish produce is renowned for its high quality; further recognises that the fresh produce industry supports thousands of Scottish jobs, and recommends to Scotland's major food retailers that Scottish produce be promoted in their stores. Supported by: Michael Russell, Mr Brian Monteith, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, David Mundell, Donald Gorrie, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Nora Radcliffe, Mr John Swinney, Alex Neil, Irene McGugan, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
